          <title>
            <string language="fr">Réflexion de la lumière du soleil</string>
            <string language="en">Reflection of sunlight</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion des Tageslichtes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão da luz solar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione di luce solare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση του φωτός του ήλιου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión de la luz del sol</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Ce diagramme prouve que la lumière du soleil frappe Jupiter et est refléchie vers la terre.</string>
            <string language="en">This diagram shows that the sunlight hits Jupiter and is reflected towards the Earth.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">La Terre</string>
            <string language="en">Earth</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">Jupiter</string>
            <string language="en">Jupiter</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">planètes</string>
            <string language="en">Planets</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">le soleil</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

            <string language="en">sunlight</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm zeigt, daß das Tageslicht 
Jupiter schlägt und in Richtung zur Masse reflektiert wird.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama mostra que a luz solar bate Jupiter
e está refletida para a terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema indica che la luce solare colpisce 
Jupiter ed è riflessa verso la terra.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα δείχνει ότι το φως του ήλιου χτυπά
Δία και απεικονίζεται προς τη γη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama muestra que la luz del sol golpea 
Júpiter y está reflejada hacia la tierra.</string>
          </description>
